alert.note: Alert for Eastern Franklin; Western Franklin (Massachusetts) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 26 at 9:50PM EDT by NWS Boston
info.description: ...A thunderstorm with heavy downpours will impact portions of northeastern Franklin County through 1045 PM EDT... At 950 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a thunderstorm producing heavy downpours over Greenfield, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Minor flooding. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor nuisance flooding of typically flood prone areas. Locations impacted include... Greenfield, Deerfield, Montague, Sunderland, Northfield, Bernardston, Buckland, Shelburne, Leverett, Erving, Colrain, Gill, Charlemont, Wendell, Warwick, Leyden and Heath. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: Get indoors when you hear thunder. Do not resume outdoor activities until at least 30 minutes after the storm has passed. Do not drive through flooded roads or underpasses. Avoid low lying areas near small streams.
